item.title: Lindenmayer-Systems
item.description: Technologies: OpenGL, GLSL, QT Languages: C++ During my bachelor thesis I developed software for the generation and visualization of certain plants with stochastic Lindenmayer systems. As a result, you can create and export randomized plants there using certain strings (known as turtles). The generation itself is fully parameterizable (like thickness and vertex count) and the textures can be set for the leaves. For development I used C++, QT and OpenGL.
